com.emc.storageos.model.file

Class QuotaDirectoryUpdateParam

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.emc.storageos.model.file.QuotaDirectoryUpdateParam

  • public class QuotaDirectoryUpdateParam
extends java.lang.Object
    Attributes associated with a file system Quota directory, specified during the Quota directory creation.
